### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)

- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal extraction area
Consists of:

### Iron plate factory
Consists of:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Iron gear wheel factory
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position unknown)
- Inserter (position unknown)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting items
- Ensure that you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron-gear-wheels requires iron-plates, which must be available.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to insufficient resources
- Always check your inventory and ensure you have enough resources for the intended actions, especially when crafting or building new structures.
